Час відновлення [Конус холоду] тепер не зменшується вашими ефектами зменшення часу відновлення.

Ваша Швидкість збільшується на {1}%.

Ви отримуєте на {2}% більше Швидкості з усіх джерел.
Щоразу, коли ви поглинаєте ефект [Морозні пальці], шкода від вашого наступного [Морозний промінь] збільшується на {1}%. Накопичується до {2} разів. [Стигла кров] миттєво надає {3} накопичення ефекту.
[Морозний промінь] завдає {1}% своєї шкоди {2} ворогам поблизу.
[Чистий розум] пришвидшує підтримання вашого наступного заклинання [Таємні стріли] на {1}% або повторно застосовує [Таємний вибух] із {2}% ефективністю.
Restores {1}% mana.

Your target burns for an additional {1}% over {2} sec of the total direct damage caused by your Fireball, Fire Blast, Scorch, Pyroblast, and Flamestrike. If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Ignite.

Fire Blast causes your Ignites to spread to {3} nearby enemies.

0.Text: Deals {1} Frost damage to the target.
Blasts enemies in a {1} yard radius with frost, freezing them in place for up to {2} sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.
As a side-effect of exposure to intense cold, the caster cannot Ice Block or Ice Cold again for {1} sec.
Scored a spell critical. A second spell critical in a row will make your next Pyroblast or Flamestrike spell instant cast, and cause double the normal Ignite damage.
Your Blink spell teleports you in the direction you are moving instead of the direction you are facing.
When cast on critters, your Polymorph spells now last {1} day and can be cast on multiple targets.

Reduces the damage your pet takes from area of effect attacks by an additional {1}%.
Reduces the range at which enemies detect your pet.
Cannot benefit from Time Warp or other similar effects.
Suppresses movement slowing effects and increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.  Castable while another spell is in progress and unaffected by global cooldown.
Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than {1} min.
Transforms the Mage to look like another player for {1} min.

Channels a jet of icy water at the target, dealing {1} Frost damage to the target over {2} sec.

Water Jet automatically activates Brain Freeze.

1.Text:
Channels a jet of icy water at the target, slowing the target by {1}% and dealing {2} Frost damage to the target over {3} sec.

Water Jet automatically activates Brain Freeze.

0.Text: Reduces the size of your Water Elemental by {1}%.
Arcane Power now increases damage by {1}% and reduces mana costs by {2}%.
Frostbolt has a {1}% chance to explode on impact, dealing {2}% additional damage to the target and all other enemies within {3} yds.

1.Text: Arcane Blast has a {1}% chance to explode on impact, dealing {2}% additional damage to the target and all other enemies within {3} yds.

2.Text: Fireball has a {1}% chance to explode on impact, dealing {2}% additional damage to the target and all other enemies within {3} yds.

0.Text: An emanation of mana-fueled Arcane damage.
Blazing Barrier reduces all Physical damage you take by {1}%.
Flamestrike calls down {1} additional pillar of fire each time it is cast.
Hurls a Phoenix that causes {1} Fire damage to the target and splashes {2} Fire damage to other nearby enemies. This damage is always a critical strike.
Throws a spread of {1} cinders that travel in an arc, each dealing {2} Fire damage to enemies it hits. Damage increased by {3}% if the target is affected by your Ignite.
Chilled, reducing movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
You are able to comprehend your allies' racial languages.

Creates a runic prison at the target's location, slowing enemy movement speed by {1}%, inflicting {2} Arcane damage over {3} sec, and then detonating for Arcane damage equal to {4}% of your maximum mana.

1.Text: Reduces movement speed by {1}%.

2.Text: Deals {1} Arcane damage to all targets within {2} yds.

3.Text: Deals {1} Arcane damage to enemies within {2} yds.

4.Text: Creates a rune around the target, inflicting {1} Arcane damage over {2} sec to all enemies within {3} yds, and then detonating for Arcane damage equal to {4}% of your maximum mana.

0.Text: Launches bolts of arcane energy at the enemy target, causing {1} Arcane damage.
Ice Barrier increases your armor by {1}% while active, and Ice Block applies Ice Barrier to you when it fades.
Casting Blink ignites a Blazing Barrier around you.
Casting Scorch increases your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
When you cast Arcane Explosion, Aluneth will echo the Arcane Explosion for {1}% of its damage, at the location of your previous Arcane Explosion cast within {2} sec.
Casting {1} Fireballs or Pyroblasts calls down a Meteor at your target.
Casting {1} Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Comet Storm at your target.

While you are above {1}% mana, Arcane Blast deals {2} additional damage.

While you are below {3}% mana, Arcane Blast's cost is reduced by {4}.

Conjure a radiant spark that causes {1} Arcane damage instantly, and an additional {2} damage over {3} sec.

The target takes {4}% increased damage from your direct damage spells, stacking each time they are struck. This effect ends after {5} spells.

Conjure {1} mirrors to torment the enemy for {2} sec. Whenever the target attacks, casts a spell, or uses an ability, a mirror is consumed to inflict {3} Shadow damage and their movement and cast speed are slowed by {4}%. This effect cannot be triggered more often than once per {5} sec.

The final mirror will instead inflict {6} Shadow damage to the enemy, Rooting and Silencing them for {7} sec.

Whenever a mirror is consumed you gain Clearcasting.

1.Text:
Conjure {1} mirrors to torment the enemy for {2} sec. Whenever the target attacks, casts a spell, or uses an ability, a mirror is consumed to inflict {3} Shadow damage and their movement and cast speed are slowed by {4}%. This effect cannot be triggered more often than once per {5} sec.

The final mirror will instead inflict {6} Shadow damage to the enemy, Rooting and Silencing them for {7} sec.

Whenever a mirror is consumed your Fire Blast cooldown is reduced by {8} sec.

2.Text:

The final mirror will instead inflict {6} Shadow damage to the enemy, Rooting and Silencing them for {7} sec.

Whenever a mirror is consumed you gain Brain Freeze.

0.Text: Time Warp also increases the rate at which time passes by {1}%.
Time Warp lasts {1}% longer, but causes all affected players to be frozen in time for {2} sec at the end.

1.Text: Frozen in time for {1} sec.

0.Text: Increases the target's chance to critically hit with spells by {1}% for {2} min. When the target critically hits your Intellect and chance to critically hit with spells is increased by {3}% for {4} sec. Cannot be cast on self. Limit {5} target.

1.Text: Increases the target's chance to critically hit with spells by {1}% for {2} sec. When the target critically hits your Intellect and chance to critically hit with spells is increased by {3}% for {4} sec. Cannot be cast on self. Limit {5} target.

0.Text: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within {1} sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by {2}%. This effect can only occur once every {3} sec.
Damaging an enemy with {1} Fireballs or Pyroblasts causes your next Fireball to call down a Meteor on your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.
Each time a Mirror of Torment is consumed your spell damage is increased by {FFFFFFFF|{1}%} for {2} sec, stacking {3} times.
Shifting Power entangles enemies it hits, rooting them in place for {1} sec.
Your spells have a {1}% chance to call down a Comet Storm on your target enemy. This effect cannot occur more than once every {2} sec.
Touch of the Magi's duration is increased by {1} sec and grants {2}% mana regeneration for {3} sec.
Consuming Fingers of Frost increases spell damage by {1}% for {2} sec.
When Arcane Blast or Arcane Explosion critically strikes at least one target, the critical strike chance of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.
Phoenix Flames applies Charring Embers to all enemies it damages, increasing their damage taken from you by {1}% for {2} sec.
When your direct damage spells hit an enemy affected by Charring Embers {1} times the damage of your next {2} Phoenix Flames is increased by {3}% and they refund a charge on use.
Flurry and Ice Lance damage increased by {1}%. Flurry causes an explosion on impact, dealing {2}% of its damage to nearby enemies, damage reduced beyond {3} targets.

For every {1} Mana spent on and during Arcane Surge, your spell damage is increased by {2}% for {3} sec after Arcane Surge fades, stacking up to {4} times. Mana regeneration is increased by {5}% for this time.
Your water elemental's abilities apply Frigid Empowerment increasing the Frost damage you deal by {1}%, up to {2}%.
Glacial Spike damage increased by {1}% and it explodes when it Shatters a frozen target, dealing {2}% of its damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
When Pyroblast and Flamestrike critically strike you gain Searing Rage, increasing your critical strike damage by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3}%.
Consuming Clearcasting grants increased spell damage by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3}%.

After consuming Clearcasting {1} times, your next Arcane Missiles consumes Arcane Battery, dealing {2}% increased damage to your primary target and fires at up to {3} nearby enemies dealing {4}% increased damage.
